mapper.select: SELECT addr.ADDR_ID, addr.ADDR_INFO, addr.PERSON_ID, addr.DELETE_FLAG FROM person AS per LEFT JOIN address AS addr ON per.PERSON_ID = addr.PERSON_ID WHERE per.PERSON_ID = #{personId} AND per.DELETE_FLAG != 1

SELECT pac.PAC_ID FROM package AS pac LEFT JOIN person AS sender ON pac.SEND_ID = sender.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN person AS recver ON pac.REC_ID = recver.PERSON_ID WHERE sender.LOG_NM = #{userName} OR recver.LOG_NM = #{userName} AND pac.DELETE_FLAG != 1 AND sender.DELETE_FLAG != 1 AND recver.DELETE_FLAG != 1

SELECT pac.PAC_ID,PAC_STATUS, sender.NAME AS SENDER_NAME, sender.PHONE AS SENDER_PHONE, recver.NAME AS RECVER_NAME,recver.PHONE AS RECVER_PHONE, poster.NAME AS POSTER_NAME,poster.PHONE AS POSTER_PHONE FROM package AS pac LEFT JOIN person AS sender ON pac.SEND_ID = sender.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN person AS recver ON pac.REC_ID = recver.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN person AS poster ON pac.POS_ID = poster.PERSON_ID WHERE pac.PAC_ID = #{pacId} AND pac.DELETE_FLAG != 1 AND sender.DELETE_FLAG != 1 AND recver.DELETE_FLAG != 1 AND poster.DELETE_FLAG != 1
